channel.title: Need help with "Bridging" (Need it for OpenVPN) on Ubuntu server (Can change)
channel.description:
I want to set up a OpenVPN so I get full access to all ports on my net, and to let other use it I got a VPS. I'm following those guides: https://help.ubuntu.com/10.10/serverguide/C/network-configuration.html#bridging https://help.ubuntu.com/10.10/serverguide/C/openvpn.html but I don't get the bridging part to work.
/etc/network/interfaces: [code] auto eth0 iface eth0 inet static address XX.X.XXX.122 gateway XX.X.XXX.XX netmask 255.255.255.0 auto eth0:0 iface eth0:0 inet static address XX.X.XXX.123 gateway XX.X.XXX.XX netmask 255.255.255.0 auto lo iface lo inet loopback [/code] I censored the IPs with Xs as you can see.
So any nice guys who can help me out?
Thank you :).
